A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not much of a plot or story line.  Killing off Luke was stupid\, making him a pansy and not much of a Jedi.  Carrier Fisher was great\, as always.  It was a bunch of worthless characters.  Next to Jar Jar Binks\, this was one of the most disappointing Star Wars movies. No real Jedi action either.  Just -- horrible.
